ðŸ“– Summary: The Rich-Pixel Video Player is a Python-based tool that allows users to play videos in their terminal using Unicode half-block characters, creating a retro-style visual experience. It supports various video formats and offers options for controlling frame rate, looping, and video dimensions within the terminal.
